1. Oak Tree Road Special Improvement District

Oak Tree Road Special Improvement District
==========================================

* John Mitch, Chairman Business Administrator's Representative
* Marta Lefsky, Director of Planning and Development
* Virbhadra (Viru) N. Patel, Council Representative
* Mahesh Rajan
  Term expires December 31, 2028
* Mahesh C. Shah
  Term expires
  June 30, 2028
* Shashank Gupta
  Term expires May 5, 2028



* Joseph Peedikayil Eapen
  Term expires December 31, 2026
* Sandip Patel
  Term expires December 31, 2027
* Jahanvi Mehta
  Term expires December 31, 2027
* VACANCY
  Term expires December 31, 2025
* Christopher Kosty
  Term expires December 31, 2028

The Oak Tree Road Special Improvement District was created in 1991 by Ordinance with the purpose of securing additional parking for the business district along Oak Tree Road between Route 27 and Wood Avenue. Expenses for the Special Improvement District are paid by assessment of all properties identified in said district. A listing of these properties can be obtained through the Municipal Tax Assessor. There 11 voting members for this district. All terms serve with an expiration date with the exception of the P&D Director, Business Administrator's representative and Council Representative; all terms which coincide with the sitting Mayor.
